Articles.Content:
Sector 7 Laboratories test flies a Dragon with Jebediah Kerman, the booster that were used for the photo shoot showing the fire were taken out because the craft was too heavy and would not lift very high, you can add some if you would like, also walking down the back of this Dragon is really neat while his head bobs as you enter the saddle to ride. Also as most insects this one doesn't live long either......Have Fun hope you like it!

Craft File

https://files.secureserver.net/0sYbROdOMF5irP

Bahahahaha cute cute. Very nice! :DDD

Glad you like it! and thank you Guz!

Is this supposed to be a dragon, or a dragon fly? It looks like a dragon fly, with its 8 legs, but it seems to be breathing fire also... im confused.

EDIT: Also you mentioned it being an insect.
It's a Dragon Fly as the Craft File indicates, sorry for the confusion, it was my son's idea to make it blow fire so I did it for him, I got off track and thought it was neat to do it
I think it worked out great. I like your sons imagination, I wouldn't have thought of this at all in KSP! :DDD All my single-mind can think of is landing, orbits, and blowing things up!

The title of this thread made me think of making a "real" dragon in KSP. The dragon that I eventually made is on this thread:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81413-Here-s-a-stock-dragon-in-KSP

...and it's pretty sweet.
